body: I have made a YouTube Channel called TheIngigo. Now, I am currently making a montage full of me PvPing on Avicus and different gamemodes like Survival Games. What I would like to ask is what content would you love to see on my Channel? Survival Games, Nebula, Nexus, what do you fancy? Of course, I will record with someone else but does anyone want to record with as well? This is what I wanted to ask you guys and lasses out there! Also if you haven't noticed, I got Jr. Mod on the 6th of July so yeah! Thanks for reading and please let me know if you have suggestions! -Ingiout-

replies.body: I'd say Nebula. It's Avicus' most popular minigame, and probably our most iconic. However, I'd recommend doing some lesser known minigames, like CTH and Avicade. :D

replies.body:
Commentaries, though if you're not comfortable/don't have the hardware or software for it, do montages.

Honestly, just go with what seems best. I record whatever I'm in the mood for, whether it be Avicus, Soup, minigames, etc. etc.

Good luck! :)
